movies.title: The Silent Mountain
movies.plot: How war affects the people in the spectacular Dolomiti Mountains at the outbreak of WWI between Italy and Austria-Hungary in 1915.
movies.simplePlot: A young Austrian soldier in World War I fights his way through the Alps to rescue his first love and escape the impending explosion that will rock the mountain.

biography.bio: William Peter Moseley was born on April 27, 1987, in Gloucester, England, to Juliette (Fleming) and Peter Moseley, a cinematographer. He is the eldest of three children with a younger sister named Daisy and and younger brother named Ben. His father's name is also William's middle name. He wanted to act since he was 10 years old. The young actor had a small role in Goodbye, Mr. Chips (2002) as Forrester, and he was cast as an extra in Cider with Rosie (1998). However, his big break came when he was cast in the part of Peter Pevensie in The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (2005), picked out of thousands of boys for the role. He hopes he won't end up type-cast as Peter and to go on to carve a successful, well-rounded career in acting and directing in the future. William completed Year 13 in 2006, with A Levels in Media Studies, English and Drama. In autumn 2006, he moved to New York for several weeks to study acting under Sheila Gray, where he trained at the famous Gleeson's gym in Brooklyn in preparation for filming The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian (2008).
biography.name: William Moseley

biography.bio: Eugenia Costantini is an actress, known for 18 Years Later (2010), Una famiglia perfetta (2012) and The Silent Mountain (2014).
biography.name: Eugenia Costantini

biography.bio: Like many other female Italian film stars, Claudia Cardinale's entry into the business was by way of a beauty pageant. She was 17 years old and studying at the Centro Sperimentale in Rome when she entered a beauty contest, which resulted in her getting a succession of small film roles. Her earthy interpretations of Sicilian women got her noticed by Italian producers, and the combination of her beauty, dark, flashing eyes, explosive sexuality and genuine acting talent virtually guaranteed her stardom. After Careless (1962) she rose to the front ranks of Italian cinema, and became an international star in Federico Fellini's classic 8½ (1963) with Marcello Mastroianni. American audiences may best remember her from her starring role in Sergio Leone's Once Upon a Time in the West (1968).
biography.name: Claudia Cardinale

biography.bio: Emily Cox was born on February 23, 1985 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for The Last Kingdom (2015), Homeland (2011) and Die Vaterlosen (2011).
biography.name: Emily Cox

biography.bio: Werner Daehn was born in 1965 in Worms, Rhineland-Palatinate, Germany. He is an actor, known for xXx (2002), The Lives of Others (2006) and Valkyrie (2008).
biography.name: Werner Daehn

biography.bio: Corrado Invernizzi is an actor, known for Vincere (2009), Piazza Fontana (2012) and Marco Polo (2014).
biography.name: Corrado Invernizzi

biography.bio: Michael Cadeddu was born on April 30, 1987 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy. He is an actor, known for The Silent Mountain (2014), Un medico in famiglia (1998) and La traduzione (1997).
biography.name: Michael Cadeddu

biography.bio: Fritz Karl (born December 21, 1967) is an Austrian film, television and stage actor born in Gmunden, Upper Austria. He is one of the most busy Austrian actors. Karl lives in both Munich and Vienna with his longtime companion Elena Uhlig. The two of them have three children, born in 2007, 2010 and 2015. He has three more children from a previous relationship.
biography.name: Fritz Karl

biography.bio: Harald Windisch was born in 1966 in Innsbruck, Austria. He is an actor and writer, known for Spectre (2015), Der Leihopa (1985) and Step on It (2002).
biography.name: Harald Windisch

biography.bio: Brigitte Jaufenthaler was born on March 6, 1961 in Innsbruck, Austria. She is an actress, known for Quatuor pour une enquête (2005), The Cloud (2006) and The Silent Mountain (2014).
biography.name: Brigitte Jaufenthaler

biography.bio: Giulio Cristini is an actor, known for The Silent Mountain (2014), The Young Messiah (2016) and Hai in mano il tuo futuro! (2010).
biography.name: Giulio Cristini

biography.bio: Felix Briegel is an actor, known for The Silent Mountain (2014), Rise Up! And Dance (2014) and Das Terrameter (2013).
biography.name: Felix Briegel

biography.bio: Josef Lanz is an actor, known for The Silent Mountain (2014).
biography.name: Josef Lanz

biography.bio: Laura Bilgeri is a young actress based in Los Angeles. Bilgeri began her acting career when she was 14 years old. She made her feature film debut in the film "A Breath Of Heaven", which won the Golden Rooster Award for best foreign film. Then she appeared in the popular German/Austrian TV Series Vienna Crime Squad. Laura gained international attention when she got a role in the 2014 World War I Drama "The Silent Mountain" along side film icon Claudia Cardinale ("Once Upon a Time in the West") and British actor William Moseley ("The Chronicles Of Narnia", "Royals") She also co-stared alongside Emmy Award winning actress Pamela Adlon in the new FX series "Better Things", directed by Louis C.K. Besides she's been working as a model in the US, Italy, Austria, Germany, Switzerland & China. Bilgeri was also featured in the new US wide Mazda Commercial, produced by Ridley Scott & directed by Jake Scott.
biography.name: Laura Bilgeri

biography.bio: Franz Weichenberger is an actor, known for The Silent Mountain (2014), Der Metzger und der Tote im Haifischbecken (2015) and Bible code (2008).
biography.name: Franz Weichenberger
